DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Clinical Biomechanical Correlation During Return Sport After Anterior Cruciate Ligament Injury
DOC.detailed_description: ACL injury sport practice frequent surgery subject want return sport . Re injury return sport significant clinical biomechanical risk factor describe . But study investigate link clinical biomechanical risk period . The study search highlight correlation clinical biomechanical factor . Investigators realize clinical evaluation ( pain , translation ) functional test ( single hop test , triple hop test , 6m time hop test , crossover test ) . For biomechanical data , investigator test 2 exercise motion analyse laboratory ( drop vertical jump cut task ) , translation knee test GnRB isokinetic evaluation . Investigators compare result injured subject control group non-injured .
